title: Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater soft and comfortable, with one describing it as feeling like a gentle hug.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Merino wool-my new favorite!!!
items.body: I purchased this for a photo shoot for my casual Headshots for my business. It had the soft textured effect that I was going for and worked great for the photos. I did not realize that it was Merino wool until after the fact. I live in South Florida, and this was in late November. The weather is warm here. I walked around a shopping center wearing this after my photo shoot in mid 80° weather and realized I never got hot. I was talking to my son later and he happened to be talking about his latest favorite Merino wool and the advantages of it. When I returned home, I took the sweater off and happen to look at the label for the care and notice it was Merino wool. What an amazing plus for a purchase that I was just getting for a photo shoot -ended up - It wasn’t just another sweater. It was one that would serve me very well in all climates whether I am in 80+ degree weather in South Florida or I’m in winter in colder extreme climates! I’m looking forward to taking this with me on trips as it will also travel well and lightweight. It’s so soft, very versatile and is great quality. Read more
items.author: Traci

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm, gorgeous deep red color
items.body: Color and cut are great. Important to know - do not wear this sweater with top coats that have Berber fleece inside, it will pill. No problem for me, as a trusted small pill shaving tool is always ready to make my garments look new. I took an afternoon nap in this sweater under a Berber fleece lined blanket, and pilling was noticeable on the brand new V neck. 10 minutes later however it looked perfect again. Warm, soft, not itchy. I hand wash my wool garments in lukewarm water, using shampoo and conditioner, since wool is like our hair. Squeeze them in towel, and lay flat to dry. Lasting a long time that way. Works for silks too. Read more
items.author: J. Vanek

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful colors, nice weight.
items.body: This is a beautiful sweater in person. The wool is light weight, but still offers warmth. It was soft and not itchy. I took my normal size of xl and it was a good fit for me. I bought this sweater in three colors, grey, red and lavender. All are really beautiful and I received many compliments when I wore them. My mother also purchased a couple of these as well. It’s a great basic to build on. I like that it’s 100% wool. I am able to dress these sweaters up for work or down for weekends. Read more
items.author: Alison

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars nice looking but bad quality
items.body: nice and worm, but the neck line got damaged (I have no idea how) the very first time I wear it: now there's a hole. Read more
items.author: Marta

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Luscious!
items.body: I'm a fan of wool, cashmere, mohair, and other natural fibers for my winter garments. And I prefer a V-neck for most pullovers. So I was thrilled when this soft, warm, and lovely garment appeared on my doorstep. The color is an attractive blend, it is comfy and nicely made. Thanks. Read more
items.author: MKM from NYC

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beige Color is Light Pink, But Nice Sweater
items.body: The beige is NOT beige. It’s light pink in color. Returned. The fabric and size was great. Medium size fit. I’m 5-7, 142 lbs. Nice looking if you want light pink but beige. I retuned due to color but may purchase a different color. Where a camisole, tank or Tshirt underneath if fabric bothers you. It’s an easy solution for a lovely jumper/pullover sweater that’s elegant. Read more
items.author: Daphne

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous sweater, but manufacturer ruined integrity of the item with tag placement
items.body: Gorgeous sweater and color. However, the tag was attached in a way that ruins the sweater. Tried twice and both sweaters ruined. Read more
items.author: CJacobs

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this sweater!
items.body: This sweater exceeded my expectations! Not cheap but worth it. Perfect body skimming fit, so soft against the skin. Definite quiet elegance vibes, perfect to funk up with jeans and jewelry. I’m back to buy in other colors. Read more
items.author: Queen Mum to Two Princesses

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Tan, Brown, Maple Leaf, Pink, Beige, Purple, Black, Caramel, Navy Blue, Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
